title: Diamond Floral Vaddanam - A Timeless Waist Belt
materials: 18K Yellow Gold base meticulously set with brilliant-cut Diamonds. Features genuine Ruby accent (0.84 carats)
Pink Beads(3.82 carats) and Blue beads(26.32 carats). Hyderabadi Polish for lasting shine and durability.
features: Intricate floral design with a central paisley motif. The entire Vaddanam is studded with diamonds. Features cascading drop earrings with Blue and Emerald beads, offering movement and a touch of vibrant color. Masterfully crafted in a delicate filigree style.
colors: with vibrant accents of emerald green
and sapphire blue. A classic and auspicious color palette.
occasions: or any grand celebration where a statement piece is desired. Adds a regal touch to traditional attire such as sarees and lehengas.
description: This Diamond Vaddanam is a masterpiece of craftsmanship, blending traditional South Indian design with modern elegance. Its exquisite detailing and the use of genuine gemstones make it a cherished heirloom piece. A symbol of prosperity and beauty, it's a must-have for any discerning jewelry collector.
